thread.title: Petroquest Energy Announces Sale Of Gulf Of Mexico Assets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Petroquest Energy Announces Sale Of Gulf Of Mexico Assets

organizations.name: petroquest energy announces sale of gulf of mexico assets feb

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Petroquest Energy Inc:
* PETROQUEST ENERGY ANNOUNCES SALE OF GULF OF MEXICO ASSETS; 2017 ESTIMATED PROVED OIL AND GAS RESERVES AND PRODUCTION
* PETROQUEST ENERGY INC - IN CONNECTION WITH SALE, CO EXPECTS TO RECEIVE A CASH REFUND OF APPROXIMATELY $10.3 MILLION
* PETROQUEST ENERGY - ESTIMATED Q4 PRODUCTION, INCLUDING SOLD ASSETS, TOTALED ABOUT 8.6 BCFE, OR 93.7 MMCFE PER DAY VERSUS GUIDANCE OF 91-95 MMCFE/D
* PETROQUEST ENERGY - AS A RESULT OF THE SOLD ASSETS, HAS ELIMINATED AN ABOUT $35.4 MILLION UNDISCOUNTED ABANDONMENT LIABILITY FROM LONG-TERM OBLIGATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
